errors.error_description: Added pip3 install fhempy before the FHEM update commands, which should be done automatically by FHEM instead
correction_candidates: Remove the pip3 install fhempy line and keep only the update add command first
Move pip3 install fhempy to after the shutdown restart command
Replace pip3 install fhempy with sudo pip3 install --system-site-packages fhempy
Change pip3 install fhempy to python3 -m pip install --user fhempy
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip3 install fhempy line and keep only the update add command first
